endpoints.description: Retrieve energy consumption data from integrated smart devices.
Acquire analytical insights based on collected energy consumption data.
Submit a new smart device energy usage profile for analysis.
Receive customized recommendations for energy consumption optimization.
Update the energy usage profile of a specific smart device.
Remove a specific smart device from the energy tracking service.
Submit utility platform information for further energy consumption insights.
Retrieve an overview dashboard showing energy usage and savings.
Download a detailed report on energy consumption and recommendations.
Send user feedback on the provided insights and recommendations.
